comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: Oh lovely! I read acres (it seems) of 17th- and 18-century English newspapers while in grad school, but almost all on microfiche. This is astonishingly better.

comment.author: 52564461@N00
comment._content: it's amusing how there's no content on the front page at all!
